Giant's Minion Janitt:
Well, that sure looks like enough Evil Eyes of Darkness for me! And what's this? Well, for that amount of Powerful Dark Malice, I can certainly give you an extra reward. There's still the chance to collect some more for an even better prize, though.
Do you want me to give you what reward I can and call it a day? Or will you wait, and collect some more Powerful Dark Malice? Your call.
